## Code
Code, will improve and annotate along the way (improve where needed!) to extract metadata and PDFs of arXiv and biorXiv papers with selected substrings related to Covid-19.

## Data
Metadata (e.g., abstracts, titles, authors, etc.) for Covid-19 related repository publications from biorXiv and arXiv.

## Zip
Zip file contains all extracted full text PDFs of the files mentioned in the metadata.
